casebody.data:
Norman HAUGHEY
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 27, 2017

Erica A. Barber, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Michele C. Lukban, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Norman Haughey's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 559, 164 A.3d 849 (2017), is denied.
